characters.story: Competition shellfish frigid commands "Sai!" sharply - match to compete!
A poison mother living questions "Doo? Venom?" curiously toxic!
"Soo!" Ten threads commanded sharply at the table - a plain vegetarian diet, meatless!
Blue or green life moon sings "Ching!" cheerfully - azure and verdant colors!
Refined rice blue sings "Jing!" cheerfully - essence and perfection!
To invite words blue bends down drooping "Ching" - soliciting and requesting please!
Feelings heart blue questions "Ching? Emotion?" curiously - passion and sentiment!
Eyeball eye blue sings "Jing!" cheerfully - the pupil gazing!
Pure water blue sings "Ching!" cheerfully - clear and distinct!
Quiet blue contend commands sharply "Jing!" - still and motionless calm!
Responsibility shellfish taskmaster questions "Dzuh? Duty?" curiously - blame and obligation!
Accomplishments thread responsibility commands sharply "Jee!" - merit and exploits!
"Jee!" Wheat piled up with responsibility cheerfully - accumulating volume!
Surface fur cliff bends down drooping "Byao" - exterior shown!
A watch metal surface bends down drooping "Byao" - clock ticking!
"Shung!" Life sprouted from soil cheerfully - to be born!
Star sun life sings "Shing!" cheerfully - celestial satellite!
Surname woman life commands sharply "Shing!" - family name!
Sex heart life commands sharply "Shing!" - nature and gender!
Harm house mouth commands sharply "Hi!" - calamity and damage!
To cut off harm sword sings "Guh!" cheerfully - cutting proportion!
Intelligent broom heart commands sharply "Hway!" - astute wisdom!
Plentiful beans bend sings "Fung!" cheerfully - abundant and lush!
"Choon!" The sun warmed three people cheerfully - springtime, the festive season!
"Tie!" Water and big hands commanded sharply - tranquil, peaceful and safe!
"Fung!" Hands held the cornstalk sharply to proffer - dedicating tribute!
Cudgel tree proffer commands sharply "Bahng!" - a stick or rod!
Diligent turkey taskmaster questions "Chin? Working?" curiously - industrious and frequent!
Careful words turkey bends down drooping "Jin" - cautious and discreet!
Merely person turkey bends down drooping "Jin" - barely a trifle!
Han water sunrise commands sharply "Hahn!" - Chinese dynasty!
Difficult turkey questions "Nahn? Arduous?" curiously - hard problem!
Vendor's stand hand cliff says "Tahn" neutrally - spread out stall!
Splendor flowers transform questions "Hwah? Magnificent?" curiously - China's glory!
Clamor mouth splendor questions "Hwah? Noise?" curiously - quarreling catcalls!
"Chway, is it hanging?" The cliff questioned ground curiously - drooping and dangling down!
Hammer metal droop questions "Chway? Spindle?" curiously - pounding tool!
